item.title: LA fires live updates: Crews finding remains in Altadena
item.description: At least 24 people are believed to be dead and more than a dozen others remain unaccounted for as multiple wildfires rage across Southern California.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Firm has no plans to salvage more Titanic artifacts, snuffing out legal fight
item.description: The U.S. has ended its latest legal battle against the company that owns the salvage rights to the Titanic shipwreck

item.title: Judge says DOJ can release Jack Smith's final report on his Jan. 6 case against Trump
item.description: A federal judge has ruled that the DOJ can release Volume One of special counsel report Jack Smith's report covering his election interference case ag...

item.title: How a single home on Altadena block survived after Eaton Fire burned neighborhood
item.description: As the Eaton Fire ravaged everything in its path in Altadena, generations of homes were destroyed, except for one woman whose home was spared.
